EV isolated method: Plasma exosomes were isolated and purified using the exoRNeasy serum/plasma midi kit (Qiagen, USA) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Briefly, 1 volume of buffer XBP was mixed with the pre-filtered plasma sample and added onto the exoEasy spin column. After centrifugation, the pelleted fraction was re-suspended in nuclease-free water for later analysis or subjected to RNA extraction immediately. All centrifugation steps were performed at 4°C.
